item.title: SusGlobal Energy Corp 10-K
item.description: SusGlobal Energy Corp, which is in the Refuse Systems [4953] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 15, 2021 had 32093 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 525 instances 2019 - 510 instances 000 - 336 instances c - 333 instances 2020 - 323 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
